summary.span: 公開 類別的公用成員至 Unmanaged 程式碼。

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此介面會從 unmanaged 程式碼會存取 managed 類別，而且不應該從 managed 程式碼呼叫。This interface is for access to managed classes from unmanaged code and should not be called from managed code. 這個介面會保留 vtable 順序的類別可由 unmanaged COM 物件存取的成員。This interface preserves the vtable order of the class members that can be accessed by unmanaged COM objects.

MemberSignature.Value: public void GetIDsOfNames (ref Guid riid, IntPtr rgszNames, uint cNames, uint lcid, IntPtr rgDispId);

public: void GetIDsOfNames(Guid % riid, IntPtr rgszNames, System::UInt32 cNames, System::UInt32 lcid, IntPtr rgDispId);

param.name: riid
param.span: 保留供未來使用。

span.span: Reserved for future use.

param.span: 必須是 IID_NULL。

span.span: Must be IID_NULL.

param.name: rgszNames
param.span: 要對應的名稱陣列。

span.span: An array of names to be mapped.

param.name: cNames
param.span: 要對應之名稱的計數。

span.span: The count of the names to be mapped.

param.name: lcid
param.span: 用於解譯名稱的地區設定內容。

span.span: The locale context in which to interpret the names.

param.name: rgDispId
param.span: 由呼叫端配置的陣列，接收對應於名稱的識別項。

span.span: An array allocated by the caller that receives the identifiers corresponding to the names.

summary.span: 將一組名稱對應至一組對應的分派識別項 (Dispatch Identifier)。
